name: AIVA
description: AIVA is a Composable Interface Protocol that turns natural language intent into a live UI that already knows how to act. AIVA turns plain-language requests into live, purpose-built interfaces that execute tasks instantly. Instead of endless tabs and dashboards, users can swap tokens, book flights, track wallets, or compare DeFi yields with a single prompt. Its Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) connects to verified paths on-chain and Web2. $AIVA fuels, secures, and rewards the entire network.
